label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_020
content:
## 2024-07-15 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 126
- Active: 117
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 35
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 9

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 30
- Mid Dose: 31
- High Dose: 31
- Placebo: 34

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 64.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 18.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 96.6
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 161.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 111.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 29.5
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 106.8
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 169.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 246.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 179.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 42.5
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 140.6
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 41.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 222.9
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 329.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 242.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 53.7
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 15.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 3.1
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 19.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 39.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 28.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 6.7

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 55.1
- Erythema Percentage: 23.9
- Swelling Percentage: 11.5
- Induration Percentage: 10.5
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 34.3

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 16.4
- Fatigue Percentage: 21.9
- Myalgia Percentage: 31.5
- Headache Percentage: 23.0
- Chills Percentage: 11.5

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 5.7
- WBC (K) SD: 1.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 38.6
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 6.7
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 51.5
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 8.0
- Platelets (K) Mean: 225
- Platelets (K) SD: 44
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 6.9
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.0
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.7
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2068, Description: chills, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2023, Description: headache, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2009, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2054, Description: nausea, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose

### Events
- DSMB safety review teleconference completed
- Reactogenicity diary card collection rate: 95%
- Site 03 monitoring visit, 3 minor findings

### Notes
- Week 20: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 126 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
